SEARCH
Package net.chaossquad.mclib.actionbar

Klasse ActionBarManager

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.actionbar.manager.ActionBarManager
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
ExternalScheduledActionBarManager, SelfSchedulingActionBarManager
public abstract class ActionBarManager extends Object
Solves the problem of handling multiple actionbars at once. With Player.Spigot.sendMessage(ChatMessageType, BaseComponent...), one actionbar would remove another actionbar. With the ActionBarManager, it is possible to display multiple actionbars at once.
